transcript: Hi, this is Sarah from Sales Corp. I see you signed up for our trial last month. How has your experience been? I understand your concerns about the pricing. Yes, our enterprise tier is a significant investment. I can explain the ROI calculations... I see. Well, if budget is the main constraint, perhaps we could revisit this in the next quarter? No? Alright, I appreciate your time and feedback. Please don't hesitate to reach out if your situation changes.
